H0.text: what are the top five wine producing states. California

H1.text: what are the top five wine producing states. New York

H2.text: what are the top five wine producing states. Washington

H3.text: what are the top five wine producing states. Oregon

A5.text: More than 90% of the total American wine production occurs in the states of California, Washington, and Oregon

A6.text: California has more than 4,200 wineries ranging from home-grown and small boutiques to large corporations with international distribution

A7.text: California produces wines made in nearly every single known wine style including sparkling, dessert and fortified wines
